name: Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow 🍂
description:
Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow is a cute hidden object game set in a cozy American town that embodies the very essence of autumn.

100 cats are waiting for you to be discovered within a hand-drawn background.
Relax thanks to the chill soundtrack

Found a cat? Click on it!

Features

🐾 1 Level, 100 cats
❔ Easter Eggs
💡 Hint System
⏰ Timer mode with leaderboard
⚙️ In-game Settings



https://store.steampowered.com/app/2356500/Cats_Hidden_in_Bali/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608040/Cats_Hidden_in_China https://store.steampowered.com/app/2377970/Cats_Hidden_Around_the_World/
